Property.name: EnableCDMetalSonic
Property.HelpText: Enable the Metal Sonic model from the Mystic Ruins Base over Metal Sonic.

Property.name: MetalSonicHoverBehavior
Property.HelpText: Swaps Metal Sonic's hover behavior. "Swap" for swapping the Run/Hover animations. "Always" to make Metal Sonic always hover at higher speeds.

Property.name: StretchyShoes
Property.HelpText: Controls the behavior of Sonic's stretchy shoes. Use "LSDashStretch" for the addition of stretchy shoes on the Light Speed Shoes.

Property.name: HighResTextures
Property.HelpText: Uses higher resolution character textures found in the AutoDemo.

Property.name: DisableSaturnSkyChase
Property.HelpText: When enabled, the EV models from the cutscenes involving Sky Chase are used for gameplay.
